title: Week 4 Bets, Brady Quinn Pops By (Football 09/29)
description:
A four-man betting special on this edition, as Nick Kostos, Will Brinson, Pete Prisco and Jason La Canfora give their Week 4 picks. Listen for betting advice on another London tilt between the Saints and Dolphins (4:17), if Cam can keep it close vs. the Patriots (8:40), whether the Rams are for real heading into their matchup against the Cowboys (10:30), and how in the world to approach Jags-Jets (18:57). Analysis continues on a heated division battle as the Steelers and Ravens face off (26:05) and as arguably the best team in the league, the Falcons, host the Bills (29:50). Then, former pro and Notre Dame quarterback Brady Quinn briefly joins the show to answer if Philip Rivers is washed up (36:30). Keep listening for the 'Kiss of Death' special and who to pick in primetime (43:08). ​
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Football, NFL, NFL Picks, NFL Betting, 2022 NFL, NFL Predictions, NFL Recap
itunes:subtitle: The Pick Six guys give their Week 4 picks including 'Best Bets' against the spread, all while breaking down the matchups ahead in this week of the NFL. Then, a quick appearance by Brady Quinn.
